EN: The game fails and starts again

CN: 摧毁指定水果兵并获得积分
EN: Destroy the designated player and gain points

CN: 您将对水果使用锤子,使用后水果立即消失
EN: You will use a hammer on the fruit, and the fruit will disappear immediately after use

CN: 将下落的水果变为指定类型水果并获得积分
EN: Change the falling fruit into the fruit of the specified type and obtain the integral

CN: 请选择需要变换的水果
EN: Please select the fruit to be transformed

CN: 摧毁所有的同类水果并获得积分
EN: Destroy all similar fruits and gain points

CN: 您将对水果使用大炸弹使用后,所有同类型水果立即消失
EN: You will use a big bomb on the fruit. After using it, all fruits of the same type will disappear immediately
